author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_16_0_X` (branch `CMSSW_16_1_X`): 
   * This is the PR for the master branch, which will then be backported down to `16_0_X` (the latter is the release cycle targeted to be used for Run-3 HLT-menu development in 2026).

These updates correspond to the updates towards the first version "V1.0" of the `GRun` menu for the 2026 pp data-taking.
- Migrate all tables to use `CMSSW_16_0_0_pre4` template
- update TSG scripts to use `16_0_X`
- remove 15.1.X-based `customizeHLTforCMSSW` customization functions

In addition this PR introduces the following commit:
- 6364589a5234950091768535c76f48ecf1f77fbe: update global tags to be used 2026 TSG tests

#### PR validation:

TSG integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, it will be backported to `CMSSW_16_0_X` which is the current TSG development cycle.
title: HLT menu development for `16_0_X` (1/N) [`16_1_X`]
